channel.title: User_guides on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in User_guides on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Web Design Components
item.description: The PyData Sphinx Theme uses sphinx-design to add several UI components and provide extra flexibility for content creation. These include badges, buttons, cards, and tabs, among other components. This theme provides custom CSS to ensure that sphinx-design elements look and feel consistent with this theme. Seealso For more information about how to use these extensions, see the sphinx-design documentation. Below you can find some examples of the components created with the sphinx-design extension.
